text: ehidi sanwardhanaya wu ratawal siya rate wiyapath wuwange simawa awurudu 65 k dakwa nirnaya karanu labana athara sanwardhanaya wemin pawathina ratawal eya wayasa awurudu 60 dakwa sima kota atha.

nil tharu rana ingi bingi pana ahasa yata..yanna athishayinma alankarawathwuda,kawyathmaka wuda yedumaki.chiththa rupa danawannaki.nil pahayen didulana tharaka ahase didulana ayuru apa manasehi mawi nopenenneda?pilkada udama alawi inna hithayi mata yannen aya sambhoga suwaya widimata aya thula athi kamaththa sankethawath we.aya tharuniyaki.atham wita owun alutha wiwahapath wu joduwak wiya hakiya.aya thula daanekuth kanthawanta thibenna wu aashawan a thula da nomathida?kese wuwath ee bhagyaya ayata natha.age swamipurushayaya ayata thani rakimata nowa henata thani rakimata yamata siduwa atha.eeta hethuwa owunta muhuna pamata athi aarthika pidawan nisa nowannehida?kese namuth eya owun akara pawathina wu premayata nam badhawak wi nathi baw pene.

uda : wasi wathuren waga kirima kaluthara disthrikkaye ganwathura athi wiya haki pradesha sithiyam kirima pasal mattamin aapada prathichara kandayam athi kirima sama pradeshiya lekam kottashayakatama aapada kalamanakarana sambandhikarana kamitu pihituwima sama pradeshiya lekam kottashayakatama pradeshiya mattame aapada prathichara saha kriyakari salasmak sakas kirima shri lankawe aapada thorathuru paddhathiyak ha web adawiyak athi kirima madakalapuwa disthrikkaye sunami ha yuddhayata goduru wuwanta aadayam ipidawime wadasatahan kriyathmaka kirima “marga sithiyama” yanu aapada awadanam kalamanakaranaya sandaha wana kriyamarga athulath wasara 10 ka paripurna wadasatahanaki.

uthsawa aththikaram mudal ha gaman wiyadam dimana nolabimen asiruthawayata pathwa athi sewakayin wenuwen adala mudal kadinamn gewimata aanduwa katayuthu kala yathu bawa apa sangamaya baladharin wetha meyin awadharanaya karannemu, thawada hitapu aanduwa siya deshapalana abhimatharthayan wenuwen pawathwu uthsawa wenuwen departhamenthuwa sathu mahajana mudal awabhawitha kirima sambandawa apa thula wu kala kirima wenas kirimata pamini wathman yahapalana aanduwa sewaka ayithiwasikamda kappadu karamin mudal nasthi kirima yahapalanaya namata pamanak sima wi athi bawa meyin awadharanaya karannemu,
